creator: zenitram2@hotmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28965
Case test

I have a thread group with a lot of step. Some of theses steps are the same functionnality (using inclusion controler) execute at different moment of the test.
To be able to have different step name of this step I use a "User defied variable" wich have the same name but different value for each step.

In the result tree we have always the same name, in fact it is the name of the last value of my "User defied variable" as the varaible is initialized at the begining of the test and not for each step of the test.

Please post your question on JMeter user list
http://jmeter.apache.org/mail2.html

See user manual too:
http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/component_reference.html#User_Defined_Variables
creator: milamber@apache.org
